          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_060268be54541634a50b19e0f0ffad08560481a1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dissolving sugar in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auflösender Zucker im Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sucre de dissolution dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Açúcar dissolvendo-se na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zucchero di dissoluzione in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλύοντας ζάχαρη στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Azúcar que disuelve en agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This graph shows that more sugar can be dissolved in a given amount of water as the water temperature is increased.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugar and water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß mehr Zucker in einer 
gegebenen Menge Wasser aufgelöst werden kann, während die 
Wassertemperatur erhöht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique prouve que plus de sucre peut être 
dissous dans une quantité donnée de l'eau à mesure que la 
température de l'eau est augmentée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico mostra que mais açúcar pode ser 
dissolvido em uma quantidade dada de água enquanto a temperatura de 
água é aumentada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico indica che il più zucchero può 
essere dissolto in una data quantità di acqua mentre la temperatura 
dell'acqua è aumentata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση δείχνει ότι περισσότερη 
ζάχαρη μπορεί να διαλυθεί σε ένα δεδομένο ποσό ύδατος καθώς η 
θερμοκρασία ύδατος αυξάνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico muestra que más azúcar se puede 
disolver en una cantidad dada de agua mientras que se aumenta la 
temperatura del agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zucker und Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mélange</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sucre et l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mistura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">açúcar e água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">miscela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">zucchero ed acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μίγμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σάκχαρα και ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mezcla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">azúcar y agua</string>
          </keyword>
